The reference x was not found in the current environment.
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

In environment a, b : lb H : a ⪯ b H0 : forall l m : lb, l ⪯ l ⊕ m -> l ⟂ m H1 : forall l m : lb, l ⟂ m -> l ⪯ l ⊕ m H2 : forall a x y : lb, a ⟂ x -> a ⟂ y -> x ⟂ y -> (a ⊕ x) ↓ (a ⊕ y) ≂ a H3 : forall a x y : lb, a ⟂ x -> a ⟂ y -> x ⟂ y -> (a ⊕ x) ↓ (a ⊕ y) ⪯ a Unable to unify "(?M2083 ⊕ ?M2084) ↓ (?M2083 ⊕ ?M2085) ⪯ ?M2083" with "exists x : lb, b ≂ a ⊕ x /\\ a ⪯ a ⊕ x".

In environment H4 : forall a b : lb, a ⟂ b -> b ⟂ a a, b : lb H : a ⪯ b H0 : forall l m : lb, l ⪯ l ⊕ m -> l ⟂ m H1 : forall l m : lb, l ⟂ m -> l ⪯ l ⊕ m H2 : forall a x y : lb, a ⟂ x -> a ⟂ y -> (a ⊕ x) ↓ (a ⊕ y) ≂ a -> x ⟂ y H5 : forall a x y : lb, a ⟂ x -> a ⟂ y -> x ⟂ y -> (a ⊕ x) ↓ (a ⊕ y) ≂ a Unable to unify "?M3018 ⟂ ?M3020" with "exists x : lb, b ≂ a ⊕ x /\\ a ⪯ a ⊕ x".

original: intros a b Hab. apply lb_ortho_plus in Hab. destruct Hab as [x Hab]. exists x. split. - apply lb_ortho_plus_id; apply lb_ortho_sym; auto. - apply lb_ortho_anti; auto.
